description:
With his friends about to be permanently entombed in wax, Usopp is provided with the perfect opportunity to be brave and make his father proud.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Iza Hangeki! Usopp no Kiten to Kaenboshi!
La contre-attaque ! Usopp tient le premier rôle !
Time to Fight Back! Usopp`s Quick Thinking and Fire Star!
Контратака! Смекалка и огненная звезда Усоппа
ได้เวลาเอาคืน! ความฉลาดของอุซปและกระสุนดินระเบิด!
いざ反撃! ウソップの機転と火炎星!
